description: Dirty little blond boy Pete Ross mans the main desk in his real estateoffice. Sure, Pete looks innocent enough - all decked out in his wellpressed tie - but behind those apple-pie good looks is somethingmore complicated. You see, gentlemen, he is another one of thoseguys who can't control himself when presented with a dark, swarthy,hairy, tattooed, good looking Latin stud. Serendipitously, in walksExclusive Manuel Torres! All talk of the housing market soon endsand what happens next is one of the great moments of the film. Petehas never performed better, and Manuel shows his porn star talents ina way that makes him a leading contender for a long and successfulvideo career. His cock and Pete's blond ass combine to comprisesome must see footage, and this scene is sure to leave theviewer drenched and satisfied!
title: Hot Properties, Scene #04
